00020   const unsigned int DCIndex::DClayer() const {
00021     return ( ( _index >> DCINDEX_SHIFT_LAYER ) & DCINDEX_MASK_LAYER );
00022   }
00023 
00024   const unsigned int DCIndex::DCxy() const {
00025     return ( _index & DCINDEX_MASK_XY );
00026   }
00027 
00028   void DCIndex::set( const unsigned int layer,
00029                      const unsigned int xy,
00030                      const bool negative ){
00031 #ifdef DCINDEX_RANGE_CHECK
00032     if ( layer > DCINDEX_MASK_LAYER )
00033       throw std::range_error( "Value too large for field DClayer in DCIndex" );
00034     if ( xy > DCINDEX_MASK_XY-1  )
00035       throw std::range_error( "Value too large for field DCxy in DCIndex" );
00036 #endif
00037     _index = ( layer << DCINDEX_SHIFT_LAYER ) + xy;
00038     if ( negative ) {
00039       _index = -_index;
00040       if ( _index == 0 ) _index = 0x80000000;
00041     }
00042   }  // void DCIndex::set
00043 
00044 }  // namespace CALICE
